User story: As Minh (API consumer), I want to find Apinf hosted APIs.
Parent task name: Create a catalogue view for APIs

User story: As Minh (API consumer), I want to access API documentation.
As Minh (API consumer), I want to get the API keys.
Parent task name: Create an API key sign-up form or field

User story: As Minh (API consumer), I want to retrieve my API key.
Parent task name: Add API key field to user profile

User story: As Jukka (API consumer), I want to log into Apinf to be able to access my information.
As Jukka (API consumer), I want to be able to change my password.
As Jukka (API consumer), I want to be able to reset my forgotten password.
A Minh (API consumer), I want to be able to use my Github account to log into Apinf.
As Minh (API consumer), I want to view my API statistics to be able to see, how frequently my application is used.
As Minh (API consumer), I want to create custom API's mixing sources
As Minh (API consumer), I want to be able to report API problems or bugs to API administrator
Parent task name: Create a contact or message form for feedback to API administrators

User story: As Jukka (API consumer), I want to view code examples of APIs
Parent task name: Generate code examples from API structure

User story: As Harri (API administrator), I want to import API configurations to Apinf
Comment: MVP will support only importing API Umbrella configurations, importing RAML configurations is for roadmap
Parent task name: Create a form or button for importing basic API configuration (API Umbrella)

User story: As Harri (API administrator), I to create API and its configurations
Parent task name: Create a form for API definition based on API Umbrella UI

User story: As Harri (API administrator), I want to add brand elements to our organisations Apinf installation
Parent task name: Create a form for choosing basic brand elements, for example, colors and logo

User story: As Harri (API administrator), I want to view API usage logs
As Harri (API administrator), I want to view API analytics by user, by location, by time(?)
As Harri (API administrator), I want to define limits to API usage by user, by location, by time, and rate
Comment: MVP will only support rate limiting, other limitations implemented later (roadmap)
Parent task name: Add rate limiting to API configuration form

User story: As Harri (API administrator), I want to log into Apinf to be able to track API usage
As Harri (API administrator), I want to manage the lifecycle of APIs
As Harri (API administrator), I want to view visualised data of API usage
As Minh (API consumer), I want to test API calls in a sandbox.
As API owner, I want my organisation to have a custom landing page
Parent task name: Create landing page functionality for organisations
